summary: I was bored one night, so I just applyed a simple filter to the Dwarven gear.
descriptionHtml:
I was bored one night, so I just applyed a simple filter to the Dwarven gear.  

A Few Mods I Reccomend:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5600 Mystic Elven HD by Sader325
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1754 Millenia Weapon Retexture Project by Millenia
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3730 Elven Gear Retexture by Hadriel87
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=607 Skyrim HD by Nebula1
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=85 Enhanced Night Sky by CptJoker71
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=711 RWT by isoku
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3863 SkyUI by the SKYUI team
author: Ricochet Saw
